text: Bahuwa (, ) is a town and a nagar panchayat in Fatehpur district in the state of Uttar Pradesh, India. ==Demographics== India census, Bahuwa had a population of 9312. Males constitute 53% of the population and females 47%. Bahuwa has an average literacy rate of 53%, lower than the national average of 59.5%; with 62% of the males and 38% of females literate. 15% of the population is under 6 years of age. ==References== Category:Cities and towns in Fatehpur district
title: Bahuwa
